name: eggd_artemis
title: eggd_artemis
summary: Gathers required files and creates file containing urls for them

inputSpec.name: url_duration
inputSpec.label: Active url duration in seconds (default: 8 weeks)

inputSpec.name: qc_status
inputSpec.label: File containing sample qc status decision

inputSpec.name: multiqc_report
inputSpec.label: MultiQC report
inputSpec.help: MultiQC report. If not provided, will search for a MultiQC job in the project

inputSpec.name: lock_cells
inputSpec.label: Lock populated Excel cells
inputSpec.help: Boolean which controls whether to lock any cells for editing if they are populated in the Excel output file

inputSpec.name: build
inputSpec.label: build
inputSpec.help: determines if to use build 37 or 38 reference file links in the session files

inputSpec.name: select_tracks
inputSpec.label: select tracks
inputSpec.help: comma separated string of IGV reference tracks to select for including in the IGV session file
